nodes.text: Vindican owned a double-bladed lightsaber during the Great Galactic War. The Sith Lord wielded this saber when he fought with his apprentice Darth Malgus against the Jedi Master Kao Cen Darach and his Padawan Satele Shan during the Fall of Korriban. After falling in battle, his apprentice forced the saber from Vindican's hand and utilised it, to lethal effect, against the Battlemaster Darach of the Jedi Order.
